verses.verse: And there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4319>Micah.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> The <S%H505>eleven<s%> <S%H3967><s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> that were <S%H3947>taken<s%> from you, about which you <S%H422>cursed,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> of <S%H1571>also<s%> in my <S%H241>ears,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> is with me; I <S%H3947>took<s%> it. And his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be you of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And when he had <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H505>eleven<s%> <S%H3967><s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I had <S%H6942>wholly<s%> <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from my <S%H3027>hand<s%> for my <S%H1121>son,<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image and a <S%H4541>molten<s%> image: <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore I will <S%H7725>restore<s%> it to you.

Yet he <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> to his <S%H517>mother;<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to the <S%H6884>founder,<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> thereof a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image and a <S%H4541>molten<s%> image: and they were in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4319>Micah.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> had an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod,<s%> and <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> and <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> who <S%H1961>became<s%> his <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And there was a <S%H5288>young<s%> man out of <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was a <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> and he <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> from <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he could <S%H4672>find<s%> a place: and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> as he <S%H6213>journeyed.<s%> <S%H1870><s%>

And <S%H4319>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, From <S%H370>where<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> you? And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I am a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehemjudah,<s%> and I <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> I may <S%H4672>find<s%> a place.

And <S%H4319>Micah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3427>Dwell<s%> with me, and be to me a <S%H1>father<s%> and a <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H6235>ten<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by the <S%H3117>year,<s%> and a <S%H6187>suit<s%> of <S%H899>apparel,<s%> and your <S%H4241>victuals.<s%> So the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> in.
And the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H376>man;<s%> and the <S%H5288>young<s%> man was to him as <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And <S%H4318>Micah<s%> <S%H3027>consecrated<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite;<s%> and the <S%H5288>young<s%> man <S%H1961>became<s%> his <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H4318>Micah,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> I that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will do me <S%H3190>good,<s%> <S%H3588>seeing<s%> I <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H3881>Levite<s%> to my <S%H3548>priest.<s%>
